item.description:
From the event web page:

 

Hello there Salseros, Salseras, Bachateros & Cha Cha Dancers!
We are pleased to invite you to the Studio One Salsa Social

Salsa, Merengue, Bachata & Cha Cha Cha the evening away at Salsalegre Dance Academy @ Studio One - Rhode Island's Premiere Dance School.

...That's right...SALSA ON SATURDAY NIGHT!!!!

DJ FLIP... PLANS ON SERVING UP SOME, TITO PUENTE, SONORA PONCENA, CHEO FELICIANO & HECTOR LAVOE FOR ALL YOU SEXY SALSA ADDICTS. Set the date on those iPhones and Blackberrys... March. 19TH at Studio One

Get involved in the Salsa Scene. this is your opportunity to meet wonderful people, enjoy an evening out and get your latin dance fix ON!


~~~~~~~~~~~Dance Instruction Workshop~~~~~~~~~~~
(45 mins.) Contemporary Merengue Dance Instruction
(45 mins.) Cuban Movement, Styling, and Spinning Techniques...
FOR ALL LATIN DANCES (salsa, merengue, bachata, cha cha, etc.)

by your Salsalegre Dance Academy Instructors Sydonee and Martin
from 6:30pm to 8:00pm
(Arrive at 6:15pm for registrations)

Followed by the Musical Stylings of our wonderful DJ Flip Dogg with the entire Salsalegre and SalsaCity Crew.

$15 cover for the Salsa Social Bash, includes drinks and appetizers!


OR

 

$25 fee for the Dance Instruction Workshop, Includes cover, Drinks and appetizers and of course the amazing 90 minute wokshop

make it Your Night!

Studio One is located at 85 Industrial Circle, Lincoln Rhode Island suite 4102
item.how_to_find_us: If you are taking the lesson, meet me at the front entrance @ 6:15pm for introductions/reg; If you are coming to the social only, message me for my cell
item.name: Salsalegre Salsa Dancing Social @ Studio One
